title: Iverson explains why he'll never coach in NBA
text:
Iverson explains why he'll never coach in NBA Though, he will be coaching in the BIG3 summer 3-on-3 league. Post to Facebook Iverson explains why he'll never coach in NBA Though, he will be coaching in the BIG3 summer 3-on-3 league.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/allen-iverson-never-nba-coach-reason-kobe-shaq-3-on-3-money-honest-fair/   Iverson explains why he'll never coach in NBA Alysha Tsuji , USA TODAY 9:29   
Allen Iverson never wants to coach in the NBA. (Photo: USA TODAY Sports) 
Allen Iverson had a nice brief chat with TMZ Sports recently. The Hall of Famer was hilariously honest, as he almost always is. 
First, Iverson was asked about the new 3-on-3 summer league called the BIG3 that he'll be participating in , and he said he'd like to play with Kobe Bryant and Shaq, though he added that he'll mostly be just involved with coaching. 
Then, he was asked if he'd ever coach in the NBA. This is where it gets good. Iverson responded: 
"Hell nah, because I ain't coaching no motherf- that make more money than me. How the hell am I gonna tell them anything?" 
Fair enough. 
(Warning: As bleeped in the above quote, there is NSFW language in the video.)
